.. sidebar:: Module Information

   :Implemented In:
      Debugger.js
   
   :Dependencies:
      Core
      
   :Author:
      Jesse Dunlap


The P Debugger System
*********************

P offers an extended version of ``console.log``, which allows you to send different
kinds of messages. In the near future, you will be able to disable any or all of the
P logger messages.

Logging a Notice
================

.. code-block:: javascript

   P.log.notice("Hello World!");


Logging a Warning
================

.. code-block:: javascript

   P.log.warning("Warning World!");



Logging an Error
================

.. code-block:: javascript

   P.log.error("Error World!");
